title: Encountering the Unexpected | Pentecost for the Zombie Apocalypse: THE MUSICAL with 2mørVs
description:
2mørVs is a Flow-Fi music artist and has made music to cover audio clips of Jordan Peterson and myself. He recently made a whole album using one of my most pivotal talks titled Pentecost for the Zombie Apocalypse (https://youtu.be/zXOdlIXDsr8). The album is called Pentecost for the Zombie Apocalypse: The Musical. Today we take a look at a few music clips from the album and discuss his inspiration, how we both experienced the talk, Saint Christopher and what he means for the Church, Theosis, garments of skin, encountering the stranger and scientism. Enjoy!

Check out 2mørVs’ work:
-2mørVs & Jonathan Pageau - Pentecost for the Zombie Apocalypse: The Musical - GET THE ALBUM: https://fanlink.to/PftZAtM 
(Original talk - Pentecost for the Zombie Apocalypse: https://youtu.be/zXOdlIXDsr8)
-YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/2m%C3%B8rVs/videos
-Spofity: https://spoti.fi/2luuFu8
-Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/user-220481948
-Bitchute: https://www.bitchute.com/channel/I8oV...

Other featuring songs made by 2mørVs:
-JONATHAN PAGEAU & JORDAN PETERSON - Modern Art | Flow-Fi Mix | 2mørVs & Neochron: https://youtu.be/OtXiEefXxVU
-JONATHAN PAGEAU - On Extremism | FlowRock-Mix | 2mørVs & Neochron: https://youtu.be/8HgEO2uNxbg
-JORDAN PETERSON feat. JONATHAN PAGEAU - A Hero's Transformation | Flow-Fi Mix | 2mørVs: https://youtu.be/xV_EjcWayRs
-JONATHAN PAGEAU - Trick Or Treat | Flow-Fi Mix | 2mørVs & Neochron: https://youtu.be/QPd7orBizXM

Follow 2mørVs on social media:
-Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/2morvs/
-Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/2morvs/
-Twitter: https://twitter.com/2nerves

Support 2mørVs:
-Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/2morvs
-PayPal: https://www.paypal.me/2moreVs
-Subscribestar: https://www.subscribestar.com/2morvs

=============

Timestamps:
00:00:00 Introduction
00:01:51 What inspired you to make this music?
00:05:41 What’s the essence of the talk?
00:08:36 Song clip 1: Monsters & The Second Coming
00:10:10 Discussion: Reactions to the talk & the icon of St. Christopher
00:22:49 Song clip 2: Desire (The Edge & The End)
00:24:00 Discussion: The dissolution of Christianity
00:31:21 Song clip 3: Layers of Death
00:32:46 Discussion: Garments of skin & the double inversion
00:43:33 Song clip 4: The Ultimate Unexpected (The Return Of The Monster)
00:44:36 Discussion: Languages, melody & theosis
00:54:50 Song clip 5: Cynocephalus Waiting For Crumbs
00:56:34 Discussion: Literal meaning, encountering the stranger & scientism
01:11:55 Outro
